column4: Ok Let me re-ask my question another way.  How do I change the driver in ubuntu when it is   .exe
bye the way obotu, thank you
you need to get the drivers in the form of a .inf and .sys file -- perhaps you need to unpack that .exe - try unzip and/or cabextract
well, look on driverguide.com -- see if you can find the drivers in an alternate package
